title: @RIOT, thank you :D
body:
For a free to play game I've spent more money on this game than any other game I've ever owned; and that's because this is an amazing game. I could go to gamestop and spend 60$ on call of duty or whatever is popular right now, beat it in a day and play the same multiplayer over and over and over and the only change i will see is a DLC for 30$ with like 4 new maps whoo! 

Riot is always changing, always improving, always releasing new champions or skins or game-types or community events. I always look forward to seeing what new things are on the way or whats being changed for better or worse, because shit at least you're trying. You get involved with the community answering their questions, letting players play with employees, setting up fun ways for people to get involved, sharing community creations, and all around do an awesome job at what you do. The other day i saw a person post they made it to 1000 ranked wins and wanted to play with a riot employee to celebrate and you know what? A riot employee commented on that and said let's do it! That's so cool and riot is the only company connecting with their community like this.

TL;DR You guys catch a lot of heat from the community about the small things they disagree with but i think you deserve a pat on the back rito, you done good. I've been playing since season 2  and to compare that game to the well-polished world renowned game it is today is astounding. You guys have come so far and will continue to do so and that's why i love riot as a company and league as a game. Keep up the good work, can't wait to see what season 6 has in store :D

You know what I wish for, though...
- Monthly Champion Price reductions until we have close to 20 450, 40 1350, 40 3150, 30 4800, and the rest to be 6300 (or by that time, 10).
- The Bilgewater map to return and allow either Freljord or Bilgewater to be a 1v1 or 2v2 for those who just want to face off without needing a custom map.

Sorry if its a lot...

Thank you so much for playing!

It's so cool for me to have been playing since S1 to then get a job at Riot this year and discover that Rioters are some of the most passionate players around. That they, like myself, really care about the community and the future of the game. We are encouraged to interact with the players, play the game and push for ideas when we think they are really great and it's for those reasons that I love my job.

Trust is something we have to earn each day, anything we do is never perfect, we want every addition we make to be even better than the last and so it's wonderful to every so often hear that we are doing a good job. Many of us read player feedback incessantly and, despite the fact that we know it comes from a place of passion, take it very much to heart. So it's SUPER valuable to read something like this. I'll be sure to link it to my team!
